{if event.role = 'Gunner':
Vous êtes maintenant l'artilleur de cette équipe.

Vous êtes maintenant le pilote de chasse de cette équipe.

Vous n'avez pas été affecté au service actif.
}

Died.name: Died

Discovery scan.script:
{_ This event currently is being written to the journal about 15 seconds after a discovery "honk" is completed. _}
{_ Due to the extreme delay between the triggering action and the actual event, we are omitting any default script for the time being. _}
Discovery scan.name: Discovery scan
Discovery scan.description: Triggered when performing a full system scan (honk)

Docked.name: Docked
Docked.description: Triggered when your ship docks at a station or outpost

Docking cancelled.name: Docking cancelled
Docking cancelled.description: Triggered when your ship cancels a docking request at a station or outpost

Docking denied.script:
{Pause(2000)}

Nous avons un refus d'appontage

{if event.reason = "ActiveFighter":
     Car nos armes sont déployées
|elif event.reason = "Distance":
     Parce que nous sommes trop loin de la station
|elif event.reason = "Hostile":
     Parce que la sation est sous le contôle d'une faction qui ne veut pas de nous
|elif event.reason = "NoSpace":
     Parce que tous les pads d'atterrissage sont occupés
|elif event.reason = "Offences":
     Parce que nous avons récemment commis un crime contre eux!... non? sans blague?
|elif event.reason = "TooLarge":
     Parce qu'il n'y a aucune zone d'atterrissage assez grande pour notre vaisseau
}.
Docking denied.name: Docking denied
Docking denied.description: Triggered when your ship is denied docking at a station or outpost

Docking granted.name: Docking granted
Docking granted.description: Triggered when your ship is granted docking permission at a station or outpost

Docking requested.script:
Votre demande d'appontage à  {event.station} est envoyée...
{pause(200)}
Docking requested.name: Docking requested
Docking requested.description: Triggered when your ship requests docking at a station or outpost

Docking timed out.script: Pas de réponse à la demande dappontage.
Docking timed out.name: Docking timed out
Docking timed out.description: Triggered when your docking request times out

Empire honorific.name: Empire honorific
Empire honorific.description: Function to provide a suitable honorific for your commander when in the empire

Empire promotion.script:
{if event.rank = "Chevalier":
    sieur
|elif event.rank = "Banneret":
    monseigneur
|elif event.rank = "Baron":
    monseigneur
|elif event.rank = "Vicomte":
    monseigneur
|elif event.rank = "Comte":
    monseigneur
|elif event.rank = "Earl":
    monseigneur
|elif event.rank = "Duc":
    monseigneur
|elif event.rank = "Archiduc":
    votre grace
|elif event.rank = "Prince":
    Votre altesse royale
|elif event.rank = "Roi":
    Votre majesté
|else:
    commandeur
},
La flotte impériale 
{OneOf("vous a accordé une promotion pour le", "vous a promu au", "vous a gratifié du", "vous a nommé au")}
titre honorifique de 
{event.rank}
{Occasionally(2, "suite aux services rendu à l'empire")}.
Empire promotion.name: Empire promotion
Empire promotion.description: Triggered when your rank increases with the Empire

Engineer contributed.name: Engineer contributed
Engineer contributed.description: Triggered when contributing resources to an engineer in exchange for access

Engineer progressed.script: {event.engineer} vous permet daccéder aux {OneOf('plans', 'technologies','modifications','améliorations')} de grade {event.rank}.
Engineer progressed.name: Engineer progressed
Engineer progressed.description: Triggered when you reach a new rank with an engineer

Entered CQC.script: Vous entrez dans le C Q C

Entered normal space.name: Entered normal space
Entered normal space.description: Triggered when your ship enters normal space

Entered signal source.name: Entered signal source
Entered signal source.description: Triggered when your ship enters a signal source

Entered supercruise.script:
{Pause(1000)}

{OneOf("{ShipName()} ", "{ship.ident} ", "votre {ship.manufacturer} {ship.model} de {ship.role}")} {OneOf("est entré en", "a sauté en")} Hyper vitesse.
Entered supercruise.name: Entered supercruise
Entered supercruise.description: Triggered when your ship enters supercruise

Exploration data purchased.script:
{OneOf("Achat des données {OneOf('du système', 'dexploration')} pour {P(event.system)}",
            "les informations {OneOf('système', 'dexploration')} pour {P(event.system)} sont enregistré dans mes banques de données",
            "réception des données {OneOf('système', 'dexploration')} pour {P(event.system)} en provenance de la station",
            "téléchargement des données géo-spatiale pour {P(event.system)} confirmé")}.
Exploration data purchased.name: Exploration data purchased
Exploration data purchased.description: Triggered when you purchase exploration data

Exploration data sold.script:
Données d'exploration de {len(event.systems)} systèmes vendus pour {Humanise(event.reward)} crédits

{if len(event.firsts) > 0:
    , avec un bonus de {Humanise(event.bonus)} crédits pour
    {if len(event.firsts) = 1:
        une primodécouverte
    |else:
        {len(event.firsts)} primo découvertes
    }
}
.
Exploration data sold.name: Exploration data sold
Exploration data sold.description: Triggered when you sell exploration data

Exploration promotion.description: Triggered when your exploration rank increases

Galnet unread report.script:
{set articles to GalnetNewsArticles("Article")}

{if len(articles) = 0:
    Vous avez déjà lu tous les articles
|elif len(articles) = 1:
    You have one unread news item
|else:
    Vous avez {len(articles)} articles non lus
}.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: Triggered when your ship enters or exits glide

Heat damage.description: Triggered when your ship is taking damage from excessive heat

Heat warning.script:
{Occasionally(2, "Alerte:")}
La température dépasse les seuils de tolérance!.
Heat warning.name: Heat warning
Heat warning.description: Triggered when your ship's heat exceeds 100%

Honorific.script:
{if system.allegiance = "Empire":
    {if cmdr.empirerating.rank <= 4:
       commandeur
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 5:
        sieur
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank <= 11:
        monseigneur
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 12:
        votre grace
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 13:
        votre altesse royale
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 14:
        votre majesté
    }
|elif system.allegiance = "Federation":
    {if cmdr.federationrating.rank = 0:
        commandeur
    |else:
        {cmdr.federationrating.name}
    }
|else:
    commandeur
}
Honorific.name: Honorific
Honorific.description: Function to provide a suitable honorific for your commander

Hull damaged.script:
{if event.vehicle = vehicle:
    {if event.health < 40:
        Danger!:
    |elif event.health < 60:
        Attention!:
    |elif event.health < 80:
        Alerte!:
    }
    {OneOf("Coque", "Intégrité structurelle", "Intégrité")} {Occasionally(3, "est")} à {event.health}%.
}
Hull damaged.name: Hull damaged
Hull damaged.description: Triggered when your hull is damaged to a certain extent

Insurance check.script:
{set insurance to round(ship.value * cmdr.insurance / 100)}

{set covereds to round((cmdr.credits / insurance) - 0.5)}

{if covereds = 0:
  Danger: vous ne pouvez pas payer d'assurance actuellement.
|elif covereds = 1:
  Attention: Vous avez juste assez de crédit pour payer votre assurance une seule fois.
|elif covereds < 4:
  Note: Vous pouvez payer votre assurance huste deux ou trois fos.
|else
  (aucun problème dassurance avec ce compte en banque)
}
Insurance check.name: Insurance check
Insurance check.description: Check for enough credits to cover your insurance

Jet cone boost.name: Jet cone boost
Jet cone boost.description: Triggered when enough material has been collected from a solar jet cone (at a white dwarf or neutron star) for a jump boost

Jet cone damage.name: Jet cone damage
Jet cone damage.description: Triggered in normal space when passing through the jet cone from a white dwarf or neutron star causes damage to a ship module

Jumped.name: Jumped
Jumped.description: Triggered when you complete a jump to another system

Killed.name: Killed
Killed.description: Triggered when you kill another player

Landing gear.name: Landing gear
Landing gear.description: Triggered when you deploy or retract your landing gear

Landing pad report.script:
{set landingpad to state.eddi_context_landing_pad_pad}
Votre plate forme dattérissage numéro {landingpad} est 
{if landingpad = 1:
    à proximité à six heure
|elif landingpad = 2:
    proche de lentré à six heures
|elif landingpad = 3:
    à 6 heures vers le fond
|elif landingpad = 4:
    à 6 heures vers le fond
|elif landingpad = 5:
   vers les sept heures proche 
|elif landingpad = 6:
    à sept heure juste à cotés
|elif landingpad = 7:
    à sept heure vers le fond
|elif landingpad = 8:
    vers les sept heures en séloignant
|elif landingpad = 9:
    à huit heure juste devant
|elif landingpad = 10:
    à huit heures vers le fond
|elif landingpad = 11:
    à neuf heure proche
|elif landingpad = 12:
    vers les neufs juste aprés l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 13:
    vers les neufs heures, au centre de la station
|elif landingpad = 14:
    à neuf heures, au fond de la station
|elif landingpad = 15:
    à meuf heures, vers l'arrière de la station
|elif landingpad = 16:
    juste en entrant à dix heures
|elif landingpad = 17:
    à dix heures, juste aprés l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 18:
    vers les dix heures, dans le cul de basse fosse
|elif landingpad = 19:
    Vers les dix heures, au fond de la station
|elif landingpad = 20:
    à onze heures proche de l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 21:
    juste aprés l'entrée à onze heures
|elif landingpad = 22:
    vers les onze heures dans les profondeurs de la station
|elif landingpad = 23:
    au fond à onze heures
|elif landingpad = 24:
    à douze heures vers l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 25:
    à douze heure au fond
|elif landingpad = 26:
    à une heure, juste aprés l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 27:
    à une heure, proche de l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 28:
    à une heure vers le milieu de la station
|elif landingpad = 29:
    à une heure vraiment loin de l'entrée
|elif landigpad = 30:
    vers les une heure au fond de la station
|elif landingpad = 31:
    à deux heures, au début de la station
|elif landingpad = 32:
    à deux heures en entrant
|elif landingpad = 33:
    à deux heures au fond
|elif landingpad = 34:
    à deux heures au fond
|elif landingpad = 35:
 à trois heures, au début de la station
|elif landingpad = 36:
    à trois heures juste à l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 37:
    à trois heures, vers le centre de la station
|elif landingpad = 38:
    à trois heures vers le fond
|elif landingpad = 39:
    à quatres heures juste en entrant
|elif landingpad = 40:
    à quatres heures au fond
|elif landingpad = 41:
    à cinq heures peu aprés l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 42:
    à cinq heures peu aprés l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 43:
    à cinq heures vers le centre de la station
|elif landingpad = 44:
 à cinq heures au fond
|elif landingpad = 45:
 à cinq heures au fond de la station
}
 , en passant correctement avec les lumières vertes à votre droite.
Landing pad report.name: Landing pad report
Landing pad report.description: Report on the location of a landing pad

Material threshold.script:
{if event.level = 'Minimum':
    {_ Gone below the minimum level }
    {OneOf("Stock", "Inventaire", "Approvisionnement")} de {event.material.name} est passé en dessous de votre minimum surveillé.
|elif event.level = 'Maximum':
  {_ Gone above the maximum level }
    {OneOf("Stock", "Inventaire", "Approvisionnement")} of {event.material.name} a augmenté au delà de votre maximum toléré.
|else:
    {_ Moved around the desired level }
    {if event.change = 'Increase':
 Vous avez atteint la quantité optimale désirée de : {event.material.name}.
    |else:
        Vous êtes en dessous de la quantité nominale désirée pour : {event.material.name}.
    }
} 

{OneOf("Le stock actuel est de {event.amount}",
       "inventaire de {event.amount}",
       "{event.amount} unités à bord")}.
Material threshold.name: Material threshold
Material threshold.description: Triggered when a material reaches a threshold

Marché conclu avec le Commerçant de matériel de type : {event.tradertype}.

Power commodity obtained.name: Power commodity obtained
Power commodity obtained.description: Triggered when a commander obtains a commodity from a power

Power defected.name: Power defected
Power defected.description: Triggered when you defect from one power to another

Power expansion vote cast.name: Power expansion vote cast
Power expansion vote cast.description: Triggered when a commander votes for system expansion

Power joined.script: Vous avez intégré les rangs de {P(event.power)}.
Power joined.name: Power joined
Power joined.description: Triggered when you join a power

Power left.script: Vous ne faites plus parti des affiliés à  {P(event.power)}.
Power left.name: Power left
Power left.description: Triggered when you leave a power

Power preparation vote cast.script:
Votre vote d'une valeur de {if event.amount=1: une |else: {event.amount}} voix 
{OneOf("envoyé à", "enregistré pour")} {event.power} est placé sur le systême {event.system}.
Power preparation vote cast.name: Power preparation vote cast
Power preparation vote cast.description: Triggered when a commander votes for system preparation

Power salary claimed.name: Power salary claimed
Power salary claimed.description: Triggered when a commander claims salary from a power

Power voucher received.name: Power voucher received
Power voucher received.description: Triggered when a commander turns in combat vouchers against an opposing power

Repair drone.name: Repair drone
Repair drone.description: Triggered when your ship is repaired via a repair limpet controller

Report last scan value.name: Report last scan value
Report last scan value.description: Report the estimated value of the last body scanned

Screenshot.name: Screenshot
Screenshot.description: Triggered when you take a screenshot

Search and rescue.name: Search and rescue
Search and rescue.description: Triggered when delivering items to a Search and Rescue contact

Security presence report.name: Security presence report
Security presence report.description: Function to report on the details of system security

Self destruct.script:
Séquence d'auto-destruction enclenchée...
...
pensez à évacuer...
Self destruct.name: Self destruct
Self destruct.description: Triggered when you start the self destruct sequence

Settlement approached.name: Settlement approached
Settlement approached.description: Triggered when you approach a settlement

Shields down.script:
{SpeechRate ("Alerte, Alerte", "fast")}: les boucliers sont tombés.
Attention à la gestion de l'énergie.
Shields down.name: Shields down
Shields down.description: Triggered when your ship's shields go offline

Shields up.script:
Information: Bouclier réarmé en puissance minimale. 
Condensateurs en charge linéaire.
Shields up.name: Shields up
Shields up.description: Triggered when your ship's shields come online

Ship arrived.name: Ship arrived
Ship arrived.description: Triggered when you complete a ship transfer

Ship delivered.name: Ship delivered
Ship delivered.description: Triggered when your newly-purchased ship is delivered to you

Ship fsd.name: Ship fsd
Ship fsd.description: Triggered when there is a change to the status of your ship's fsd

Ship interdicted.name: Ship interdicted
Ship interdicted.description: Triggered when your ship is interdicted by another ship

Ship interdiction.name: Ship interdiction
Ship interdiction.description: Triggered when you interdict another ship

Ship loadout.name: Ship loadout
Ship loadout.description: Triggered when you obtain the loadout of your ship

Ship purchased.name: Ship purchased
Ship purchased.description: Triggered when you purchase a ship

Ship rebooted.name: Ship rebooted
Ship rebooted.description: Triggered when you run reboot/repair on your ship

Ship refuelled.name: Ship refuelled
Ship refuelled.description: Triggered when you refuel your ship

Ship renamed.name: Ship renamed
Ship renamed.description: Triggered when you rename a ship

Ship repaired.name: Ship repaired
Ship repaired.description: Triggered when you repair your ship

Ship repurchased.name: Ship repurchased
Ship repurchased.description: Triggered when you repurchase your ship

Ship restocked.name: Ship restocked
Ship restocked.description: Triggered when you restock your ship's ammunition

Ship shutdown.script: Plantage complet système, tout sur OFF.
Ship shutdown.name: Ship shutdown
Ship shutdown.description: Triggered when your ship's system are shutdown

Ship sold.script:
{OneOf("Le {ShipName(event.shipid, event.ship)} {OneOf('sort du service actif','prend sa retraite')}",
             "Mise hors service du {ShipName(event.shipid, event.ship)}",
             "vente du {ShipName(event.shipid, event.ship)}",)}
Pour la somme de {event.price} crédits.
Ship sold.name: Ship sold
Ship sold.description: Triggered when you sell a ship

Ship sold on rebuy.script: {event.ship}, vendu dans le système {event.system} pour {Humanise(event.price)} credits.
Ship sold on rebuy.name: Ship sold on rebuy
Ship sold on rebuy.description: Triggered when you sell a ship to raise funds on the insurance / rebuy screen

Ship swapped.name: Ship swapped
Ship swapped.description: Triggered when you swap a ship

Ship targeted.name: Ship targeted
Ship targeted.description: Triggered when the player selects a target

Ship transfer initiated.name: Ship transfer initiated
Ship transfer initiated.description: Triggered when you initiate a ship transfer

Shutdown.name: Shutdown
Shutdown.description: Triggered on a clean shutdown of the game

Signal detected.name: Signal detected
Signal detected.description: Triggered when a signal source is detected

Silent running.name: Silent running
Silent running.description: Triggered when you activate or deactivate silent running

Squadron rank.name: Squadron rank
Squadron rank.description: Triggered when your rank with a squadron has changed

Squadron status.script:
{_ Squadron status }
{_ Triggered when your status with a squadron changes }


{if event.status = "applied":
    You have applied for admission into the {event.name} squadron.
|elif event.status = "created":
    You have created the {event.name} squadron.
|elif event.status = "disbanded":
    The {event.name} squadron has been disbanded.
|elif event.status = "invited":
    You have been invited into the {event.name} squadron.
|elif event.status = "joined":
    You have joined the {event.name} squadron.
|elif event.status = "kicked":
    You have been kicked from the {event.name} squadron.
|elif event.status = "left":
    You have left the {event.name} squadron.
}
Squadron status.name: Squadron status
Squadron status.description: Triggered when your status with a squadron has changed

SRV docked.name: SRV docked
SRV docked.description: Triggered when you dock an SRV with your ship

SRV launched.name: SRV launched
SRV launched.description: Triggered when you launch an SRV from your ship

SRV turret.name: SRV turret
SRV turret.description: Triggered when you deploy or retract your SRV's turret

SRV turret deployable.name: SRV turret deployable
SRV turret deployable.description: Triggered when your SRV enters or leaves the restriction zone around a ship.

Star habitable zone.name: Star habitable zone
Star habitable zone.description: Report on the habitable zone around a star

Star report.name: Star report
Star report.description: Function to report on the details of the contextual body

Star scanned.name: Star scanned
Star scanned.description: Triggered when you complete a scan of a stellar body

Station no fire zone entered.script:
{if event.weaponsdeployed = "true" :
 Attention: Vous entrez dans une zone neutre avec vos armes déployées. 
 Désactivez les avant représaille de la station.
|else :
 Vous entrez dans une zone neutre. N'activez vos armes que si vous en acceptez les risques.

}
Station no fire zone entered.name: Station no fire zone entered
Station no fire zone entered.description: Triggered when your ship enters a station's no fire zone

Station no fire zone exited.script: Vous sortez d'une zone neutre. {Occasionally(5, "Assurez vous de n'être pas suivi ou attendu par vos ennemis.")}
Station no fire zone exited.name: Station no fire zone exited
Station no fire zone exited.description: Triggered when your ship exits a station's no fire zone

Station report.name: Station report
Station report.description: Function to report on the details of the current station

Swapout check.name: Swapout check
Swapout check.description: Check to see if any fitted modules are available more cheaply here

Synthesised.name: Synthesised
Synthesised.description: Triggered when you synthesise something from materials

System distance report.name: System distance report
System distance report.description: Function to report on the distance to the contextual system

System faction changed.name: System faction changed
System faction changed.description: Triggered when there is a change in the controlling faction of a watched system

System report.name: System report
System report.description: Function to report on the details of the contextual star system

System state changed.name: System state changed
System state changed.description: Triggered when there is a change in the state of a watched system

System state report.name: System state report
System state report.description: Report on the current state of the contextual system

Technology broker.name: Technology broker
Technology broker.description: Triggered when using the Technology Broker to unlock new purchasable technology

Touchdown.name: Touchdown
Touchdown.description: Triggered when your ship touches down on a planet's surface

Trade data purchased.name: Trade data purchased
Trade data purchased.description: Triggered when you purchase trade data

Trade promotion.name: Trade promotion
Trade promotion.description: Triggered when your trade rank increases

Trade voucher redeemed.name: Trade voucher redeemed
Trade voucher redeemed.description: Triggered when you redeem a trade voucher

Under attack.name: Under attack
Under attack.description: Triggered when under fire (same time as the Under Attack voice message)

Undocked.name: Undocked
Undocked.description: Triggered when your ship undocks from a station or outpost

VA initialized.name: VA initialized
VA initialized.description: Triggered when the VoiceAttack plugin is initialized

Vehicle destroyed.script:
{Pause(2000)}
 {OneOf("Votre {event.vehicle} a été perdu", "{event.vehicle} détruit", "perte de votre {event.vehicle}")}
Vehicle destroyed.name: Vehicle destroyed
Vehicle destroyed.description: Triggered when your vehicle is destroyed

Zone Occupée.name: Zone Occupée
Zone Occupée.description: Test pour savoir si une région ou station est occupée par un groupe de joueur
